messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] general thoughts
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 11/23/2003 4:50:42 PM Eastern Standard Time, UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com writes: I could use some help figuring out how to do more
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 11/23/2003 4:50:42 PM Eastern Standard Time,
UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com writes:
I could use some help figuring out how to do more academics to keep him
happy, but as little as possible to keep us happy. Sarah does like workbooks and
she'll do them in bits and spurts. I have to show a portfolio at the end of the
year but I'm not really worried about pulling that together.<<<


My suggestion is to make immediate reservations for the Live & Learn
Unschooling Conference next August. It will make an incredible difference to him AND
her.

Do it. Do it now. You're too close to miss out on this opportunity!

~Kelly


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
